Package int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.domain

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.domain.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
Recipe contains the information relative to a specific recipe.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Recipe()
    Instantiates an object without any data so that the user can add it in pieces.
    Recipe(int ID, String name, Difficulty difficulty, String description, String instructions, Time time, String imagePath)
    Constructor used when getting a recipe from the database with id included.
    Recipe(String name, Difficulty difficulty, String description, String instructions, Time time, String imagePath)
    Constructor to create a new Recipe before it is inserted into the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Recipe

      public Recipe()
      Instantiates an object without any data so that the user can add it in pieces.

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(String name, Difficulty difficulty, String description, String instructions, Time time, String imagePath)
      Constructor to create a new Recipe before it is inserted into the database.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the recipe
      difficulty - cooking difficulty of the recipe
      description - quick description of the recipe
      instructions - list of instructions to make the recipe
      time - enum time needed to cook the recipe
      imagePath - the path to the image the recipe is tied to

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int ID, String name, Difficulty difficulty, String description, String instructions, Time time, String imagePath)
      Constructor used when getting a recipe from the database with id included.
      Parameters:
      ID - ties the recipe to the db
      name - name of the recipe
      difficulty - cooking difficulty of the recipe
      description - quick description of the recipe
      instructions - list of instructions to make the recipe
      time - enum time needed to cook the recipe
      imagePath - the path to the image the recipe is tied to
